ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Singing Steel missing pieces
ygData.msgSnippet: A guildmate spent about 11 hours in Sebilis (the guild Noble House was having a radi on it) yesterday/last night, and not one single piece of Singing Steel
ygData.messageBody:
A guildmate spent about 11 hours in Sebilis (the guild Noble House was
having a radi on it) yesterday/last night, and not one single piece of
Singing Steel dropped.

-=B=-
Barrd Talespinner
Count of the NewOutRiders
35th Level Bard
The Rathe

(copied and posted on Shada's thread)
----- Original Message -----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) <garramone@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 11, 2000 9:29 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Singing Steel missing pieces


> ok i e-mailed gordon and posted on the gameplay forum:
>
> http://boards.station.sony.com/everquest/Forum4/HTML/050924.html
>
> the more i think about it, the more i realize that like imbrued armor in
> hate long ago, singing steel is not in the game.
>
> Shada
>
>
> > I'm thinking the same thing. All our Karnor's pieces exist so
> > far. Yet not one Sebilis piece has shown up.
> > If even one piece from Sebilis were to be discovered, I could
> > accept the fact that the other 2 Sebilis
> > pieces also exist, but this isnt so.
> > Bards are often overlooked, so this wouldnt surprise me. I
> > suggest sending an email to Abashi
> > (gwrinn@...) and perhaps he cant forward it to the
> > Live Team to doublecheck.
> >
> > Maev Lorekeeper
> > Tarew Marr
